sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

group.Description: language proficiency group the participant belonged to

Levels.Basic: participants in Basque classes corresponding to a CEFR A2 level
Levels.Advanced: participants in Basque classes corresponding to a CEFR C2 level

L1.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's native language (Spanish)

Ln.Description: Peformance on adapted Boston Naming Test in subject's new language (Basque)
